Class EntryRequestService

java.lang.Object
com.prototype.services.EntryRequestService
public class EntryRequestService extends Object
Service class responsible for managing EntryRequest operations, including creation, update, deletion, and QR generation/reading.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    EntryRequestService()
    Default constructor initializing required DAOs.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    bufferedQR()
    Reads a QR code using CvApi, extracts its data, determines the last request for the equipment and person, automatically toggles the request type between ENTRY and EXIT, and saves the new request.

  • Constructor Details

    • EntryRequestService

      public EntryRequestService()
      Default constructor initializing required DAOs.

  • Method Details

    • findAll

      public List<EntryRequest> findAll()
      Retrieves all existing entry requests.
      Returns:
      list of all EntryRequest records

    • findById

      public EntryRequest findById(Long id)
      Finds an entry request by ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the entry request to retrieve
      Returns:
      the found EntryRequest
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the ID is null
      RuntimeException - if the entry request does not exist

    • createQR

      public BufferedImage createQR(Long idPersona, Long idEquipment, String name)
      Generates a QR code image for the given person and equipment IDs.
      Parameters:
      idPersona - the person ID encoded in the QR
      idEquipment - the equipment ID encoded in the QR
      name - the filename used to save the generated QR image
      Returns:
      the generated QR image as BufferedImage, or null if an error occurs

    • bufferedQR

      public void bufferedQR()
      Reads a QR code using CvApi, extracts its data, determines the last request for the equipment and person, automatically toggles the request type between ENTRY and EXIT, and saves the new request.

    • createEntryRequest

      public EntryRequest createEntryRequest(Long requesterId, Long equipmentId, String purpose, RequestType requestType)
      Creates a new entry request with the provided parameters.
      Parameters:
      requesterId - ID of the person making the request
      equipmentId - ID of the equipment involved
      purpose - purpose or reason of the request
      requestType - the type of request (ENTRY or EXIT)
      Returns:
      the created EntryRequest
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if any mandatory field is null or blank

    • updateEntryRequest

      public EntryRequest updateEntryRequest(Long id, Long newRequesterId, Long newEquipmentId, String newPurpose, RequestType requestType)
      Updates an existing entry request.
      Parameters:
      id - ID of the entry request to update
      newRequesterId - optional new requester ID
      newEquipmentId - optional new equipment ID
      newPurpose - optional new purpose
      requestType - optional new request type
      Returns:
      the updated EntryRequest
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the ID is null
      RuntimeException - if the entry request does not exist

    • deleteEntryRequest

      public EntryRequest deleteEntryRequest(Long id)
      Deletes an entry request by ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the entry request to delete
      Returns:
      the deleted EntryRequest
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the ID is null
      RuntimeException - if the entry request does not exist
